title: Dish Wash Gel
description: It cuts and dissolves tough oil and grease from your dishes effectively. Soft on hands and tough on oil and grease.
advantages: (-) Tends to create rich lather easily removes and dissolves oily material from your utensils.
(-) It does not leave scratches on crockery and cookware.
(-) Less exchange of germs compares to bar soaps
(-) Unlike bar soaps, it doesnâ€™t get mushy.
(-) Skin friendly and no residue in nails and no residue on utensils.
how-to-use: Just take a spoonful of dish wash gel, dilute it with water and use.
Dip a scrubber or sponge in diluted dish wash gel and use it on utensils to clean.
Rub properly to cut down oil and grease.
Wash with clean water to get clean and shiny utensils.
